subject: Gold Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Ryan Johnson scored a flukey first-half goal that bounced off the back of the head of the goalkeeper as Jamaica defeated Honduras, 1-0, at Red Bull Arena to advance to the Gold Cup quarterfinals.
snippet: Ryan Johnson scored a flukey first-half goal that bounced off the back of the head of the goalkeeper as Jamaica defeated Honduras, 1-0, at Red Bull Arena to advance to the Gold Cup quarterfinals.
